title: Hobbies
text:
I enjoy playing Frisbee occasionally, especially during weekends. It’s a great way to stay active, enjoy the outdoors, and spend time with friends. I’ve been lucky enough to participate in a few competitions, though most of the time I spend playing it recreationally.



2nd Placing at Frisbee Competition





Playing drums is more than just a hobby; it’s a passion that infuses rhythm into every part of my life. I began drumming at a young age and have found it to be a powerful way to express myself and relieve stress. Drumming isn’t just about keeping tempo; it’s about creating a backbone for the music and energizing the entire band.
The physicality of drumming is matched by its mental benefits. It requires coordination, timing, and rhythm, which are skills that have helped me in many other areas of life. Whether I’m practicing alone or playing with a group, drumming gives me a sense of accomplishment and joy.
I particularly enjoy playing in various styles, from rock and jazz to funk and blues. Each style offers unique challenges and opportunities for creativity. Drumming has also allowed me to meet and collaborate with other musicians, expanding my social network and deepening my appreciation for music.



Drums
